entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
